HINT: Substitution Cipher

|---------- Challenge solution ----------|

as I said in the "Challenges.md" file, you can use dcode, but keep in mind that the plaintext is in italian. 

|---------- Challenge flag ----------|

flag{WHO_SAID_THE_PLAINTEXT_WAS_IN_ENGLISH}
